dct_title_s: Botswana 1:1 100 000 : 1:1 100 000 high-detail GPS road map : completely updated, fuel and essential services, extensive travel information, many activities and points of interest / InfoMap.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. 16th edition copyright "Let's Explore Africa"--Panel "Includes Zambezi Region, all game reserve tracks, waterholes, camps & more, 150+ places to stay & contact derails, waterproof, eco-friendly material"--Panel Map shows 5 classes of roads, two classes of tracks, trains, road distance (kilometers approximately) and tourist information. "Completely updated, fuel and essential services, extensive travel information, many activities & points of interest"--Panel Includes inset: North East Tuli Block. Map continued on verso.
dct_publisher_sm: Wynberg, South Africa : Florian Thieme Trading, February 2019.
